remarks: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
subdir2d.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
subdir2d.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subdir2d.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subdir2d $p |- ( ph -> ( C x. ( A - B ) ) = ( ( C x. A ) - ( C x. B ) ) ) $.
